Name: Faience shabti
Description: A fine shabti made in a pale-green glazed faience. The eyes and eye-brows are delicate and detailed in black on a well-modelled face. The wig is decorated with a simple seshed-headband which is tied at the back. The figure carries a square basket on it's back and two hoes which are both painted and moulded. Down the front is a single line of text without a border. The back is flat.
